Package gov.nih.nlm.ling.sem

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    HasPredicate
    An interface to distinguish Relation objects indicated with explicit predicates from those that are implicitly indicated.
    Ontology
    An interface to implement for abstract ontological information.
    Relation
    An interface to implement for complex semantic objects (i.e, those with arguments).
    SemanticItem
    The basic interface for all textually-grounded semantic item.
    Term
    An interface for atomic semantic items.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractRelation
    The basic implementation of the Relation interface.
    AbstractTerm
    The basic implementation of an atomic semantic object, Term.
    AppositiveDetection
    This class contains static utility methods to find and interpret appositives and exemplifications in text.
    Argument
    Represents a relation argument.
    Concept
    A basic implementation of an abstract, ontological concept without textual grounding.
    Conjunction
    Represents a multiplicity of semantic items.
    ConjunctionDetection
    This class contains static utility methods to find and interpret coordination in text.
    DomainProperties
    This class attempts to capture domain-specific semantic information as a static set of key/value pairs from a Properties object.
    Entity
    Implementation of a basic, textually grounded named entity, with potential mappings to an ontology (i.e., instances of Concept class).
    Event
    Implementation of an event, essentially a predicate-argument structure where arguments (participants) have semantic roles.
    ImplicitRelation
    Implementation of a relation that is implicit; in other words, there are no predicates that indicate the relation.
    Indicator
    Represents an abstract, non-textually grounded counterpart to a predicate.
    Interval
    Represents an interval with two real-valued endpoints.
    Modification
    Represents an attribute of a semantic item.
    Predicate
    Implementation of an atomic term that corresponds to a relation indicator.
    Predication
    A generalized predicate-argument structure.
    RelationArgument
    Represents the abstract constraints for a relation argument (participant).
    RelationDefinition
    Represents the abstract definition of a relation.
    ScalarModalityValue
    Represents a modality scale/value pair.
    SemanticItemFactory
    A factory class to instantiate semantic items.
    Sense
    Represents an indicator sense.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ScalarModalityValue.ScaleType
    Types of modality scales.
    Sense.ScopeType
